016package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.service;
017
018import android.annotation.SuppressLint;
019import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
020import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
021import androidx.room.Database;
022import androidx.room.RoomDatabase;
023import androidx.room.TypeConverter;
024import androidx.room.TypeConverters;
025import androidx.sqlite.db.SupportSQLiteDatabase;
026import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.Stitch;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.dao.PatternDao;
028import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.dao.RowDao;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.dao.RowStitchDao;
030import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.dao.UserDao;
031import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Pattern;
032import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Row;
033import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.RowStitch;
034import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.User;
035import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.service.SereknittyDatabase.Converters;
036import java.time.Instant;
037import java.util.Arrays;
038import java.util.List;
039import java.util.stream.Collectors;
040import java.util.stream.IntStream;
041import java.util.stream.Stream;
042import javax.inject.Provider;
043
044/**
045 * Defines a connection to a local Room/SQLite database, All database reads/writes are performed
046 * using data-access object (DAO) instances obtained from the singleton instance of this class.
047 */
048@Database(
049    entities = {User.class, Pattern.class, Row.class, RowStitch.class},
050    version = 1
051)
052@TypeConverters({Converters.class})
053public abstract class SereknittyDatabase extends RoomDatabase {
054
055  /**
056   * Name of SQLite database file.
057   */
058  public static final String NAME = "sereknitty-database";
059
060  SereknittyDatabase() {
061    // Package-private constructor to avoid automatic HTML generation for Javadocs.
062  }
063
064  public static String getName() {
065    return NAME;
066  }
067
068  /**
069   * Returns an instance of a {@link UserDao} implementation, providing persistence operations on
070   * instances of the {@link User} entity class.
071   */
072  public abstract UserDao getUserDao();
073
074  /**
075   * Returns an instance of a {@link PatternDao} implementation, providing persistence operations on
076   * instances of the {@link Pattern } entity class.
077   */
078  public abstract PatternDao getPatternDao();
079
080  /**
081   * Returns an instance of a {@link RowDao} implementation, providing persistence operations on
082   * instances of the {@link Row} entity class.
083   */
084  public abstract RowDao getRowDao();
085
086  /**
087   * Returns an instance of a {@link RowStitchDao} implementation, providing persistence operations on
088   * instances of the {@link RowStitchDao} entity class.
089   */
090  public abstract RowStitchDao getRowStitchDao();
091
092
093  /**
094   * Defines converters for otherwise unsupported types (initially, just {@link Instant}) to one of
095   * those supported by Room/SQLite.
096   */
097  public static class Converters {
098
099    /**
100     * Returns the specified {@link Instant} {@code value} as a {@link Long}, corresponding to the
101     * number of milliseconds elapsed since {@code 1970-01-01 00:00:00+00:00} encapsulated within
102     * {@code value}. When {@code value} is {@code null}, this method returns {@code null} as well.
103     *
104     * @param value Input {@link Instant}
105     * @return Epoch milliseconds encapsulated in {@code value}.
106     */
107    @TypeConverter
108    @Nullable
109    public static Long toLong(@Nullable Instant value) {
110      return (value != null) ? value.toEpochMilli() : null;
111    }
112
113    /**
114     * Returns an {@link Instant} instance containing the specified {@link Long} {@code value} epoch
115     * milliseconds. That is, {@code value} is interpreted as a number of milliseconds elapsed since
116     * {@code 1970-01-01 00:00:00+00:00}, and the corresponding {@link Instant} is returned. When
117     * {@code value} is {@code null}, this method returns {@code null} as well.
118     *
119     * @param value Epoch milliseconds.
120     * @return {@link Instant} corresponding to {@code value}.
121     */
122    @TypeConverter
123    @Nullable
124    public static Instant toInstant(@Nullable Long value) {
125      return (value != null) ? Instant.ofEpochMilli(value) : null;
126    }
127
128  }
129
130  /**
131   * Implements methods to be invoked on key database events.
132   */
133  public static class Callback extends RoomDatabase.Callback {
134
135    private final Provider<PatternRepository> repositoryProvider;
136
137    /**
138     *
139     *
140     * @param repositoryProvider
141     */
142    public Callback(Provider<PatternRepository> repositoryProvider) {
143      this.repositoryProvider = repositoryProvider;
144    }
145
146
147    @SuppressLint("CheckResult")
148    @Override
149    public void onCreate(@NonNull SupportSQLiteDatabase db) {
150      super.onCreate(db);
151      PatternRepository repository = repositoryProvider.get();
152      Row row = new Row();
153
154      //noinspection SimplifyStreamApiCallChains
155      List<RowStitch> stitches = Arrays.stream(Stitch.values())
156          .map((stitch) -> {
157            RowStitch rowStitch = new RowStitch();
158            rowStitch.setOrdinalPosition(stitch.ordinal());
159            return rowStitch;
160          }
161      )
162          .collect(Collectors.toList());
163      Pattern pattern = new Pattern();
164      pattern.setPatternName("Stockinette");
165      pattern.setPatternDescription("Testing");
166      //noinspection ResultOfMethodCallIgnored
167      repository.save(pattern)
168          .doOnSuccess((p) -> row.setPatternId(p.getId()))
169          .subscribe(
170              (p) -> {
171                row.setPatternId(p.getId());
172                //noinspection ResultOfMethodCallIgnored
173                repository.save(row)
174                    .doOnSuccess((r) -> stitches.forEach((s) -> s.setRowId(r.getId())))
175                    .subscribe(
176                        (r) -> repository.save(stitches)
177                            .subscribe()
178                    );
179              }
180          );
181      pattern = new Pattern();
182      pattern.setPatternName("Garter");
183      pattern.setPatternDescription("Testing here, too");
184      repository.save(pattern).subscribe();
185      // TODO Obtain DAO instances from database, and use them to perform any required preloads, e.g.
186      //  LocalDatabase database = LocalDatabase.getInstance();
187      //  etc.
188    }
189
190  }
191
192}
